resources.string: The main protagonist of the saga. He is an Italian plumber known for his bravery and heroic spirit. He wears a red shirt, blue pants, and a red cap with an M on it. His most common mission is to save Princess Peach and the Mushroom Kingdom.

Mario´s brother, also a plumber, but generally taller and slimmer than Mario. He wears a green cap with an L and has a shyer personality. While often Mario´s sidekick, in several games, he is the protagonist.

Princess of the Mushroom Kingdom, known for her pink dress and kind and noble attitude. She is often the damsel in distress that Mario must rescue, but in some games, she is shown to be brave and capable of fighting for herself.

A loyal servant of the Mushroom Kingdom. She is a small character with a white hat with red spots and a blue outfit. Although she has little combat ability, she is a very friendly character and often helps Mario and his friends in their adventures.
